title: The Grand Prix Season Singapore ready to allure visitors - Travelandtourworld.comTravelandtourworld.com
text:
The Grand Prix Season Singapore ready to allure visitors Published on : Monday, August 31, 2015
From 11 to 20 September 2015, get ready to be part of the adrenaline pumping race season with the Grand Prix Season Singapore (GPSS).
Themed “One Stop Non Stop”, GPSS 2015 will be held across major precincts in Singapore with various adrenaline-pumping lifestyle events, activities and promotions presented with creativity and gusto. Savour flavourful Peranakan dining with Candlenut or enjoy interactive cuisines with STORIES; step out in style with KEEPERS and Choo Yilin; party away at Amber Lounge, Podium Lounge and Road to Ultra; engage with the arts, culture and heritage at Singapore Pinacotheque de Paris, Little India and various museums. Expect all these and more, with something to do for any one all around the clock as the entire city changes gear for the race season.
“Grand Prix Season Singapore returns again in 2015 with the continued support of our new and existing industry stakeholders, where their diverse and innovative lifestyle offerings complement the race and provide for a most all-encompassing and dynamic season for all to be part of. With more than 100 events and promotions this year, GPSS is set to grow and provide an additional unique value proposition for the Singapore race”, says Ms Jean Ng, Director, Sports, Singapore Tourism Board.
The 2015 Formula 1 Singapore Airlines Singapore Grand Prix remains the only night street race in the global Formula One circuit. Ticket holders can look forward to in-circuit concert headliners such as Bon Jovi (USA), Maroon 5 (USA), Pharrell Williams (USA) and Spandau Ballet (UK), together with fringe acts and performances.
The GPSS 2015 Event Guide will be available at selected distribution points in the city.
